column2: an A.M. Eatery////The hyped snooze hits town
column3: and people are going crazy for it. Evidence to prove this is the long wait you will experience when you try to check this place out. I came on a Saturday morning at 10 AM and had an 80 minute wait. I took advantage of their text when ready system by getting on the list
column4: and running errands in the area. This made it bearable as the waiting area is small and most people end up waiting outside
column5: or in the longg line at the bar.
